channel.title: CVE Feed for TianoCore -- edk2
channel.description: The latest CVEs for TianoCore -- edk2

item.title: CVE-2023-45231|2024-08-30T18:59:23.502Z -- tianocore -- edk2
item.description: EDK2's Network Package is susceptible to an out-of-bounds read vulnerability when processingÂ Neighbor Discovery Redirect message. This vulnerability can be exploited by an attacker to gain unauthorized access and potentially lead to a loss of Confidentiality.

item.title: CVE-2024-1298|2024-08-13T18:23:43.259Z -- tianocore -- edk2
item.description: EDK2 contains a vulnerability when S3 sleep is activated where an Attacker may cause a Division-By-Zero due to a UNIT32 overflow via local access. A successful exploit of this vulnerability may lead to a loss of Availability.

item.title: CVE-2024-1298|2024-05-30T20:46:21.627Z -- tianocore -- edk2
item.description: EDK2 contains a vulnerability when S3 sleep is activated where an Attacker may cause a Division-By-Zero due to a UNIT32 overflow via local access. A successful exploit of this vulnerability may lead to a loss of Availability.
